## IWebSocketProxy.options property

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
options: {
        onOpen: () => void;
        onClose: (code: number, reason: string) => void;
        onError: (e: unknown) => void;
        onMessage: (data: Uint8Array | string) => void;
        logger?: Logger;
    };
```
